headline: 5 Discretionary Stocks to Buy on Solid Rebound in Consumer Confidence
summary: Consumer confidence rebounded in May, boosting the outlook for stocks like NFLX, JAKK, KTB, FOX and CHTR with rising earnings estimates.

headline: 2 Underrated Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stocks to Buy and Hold
summary: Generative AI can simplify and speed up many tasks, including content production.  It's easy to see the potential for Netflix, whose content strategy is integral to its success.  Netflix's creations have attracted millions of viewers and won many awards.

summary: Netflix, Disney, Charter, Roku and Roblox look strong as Zacks sees consumer confidence rebound and each stock earns a Buy rating.

headline: Spotting Winners: Chegg (NYSE:CHGG) And Consumer Subscription Stocks In Q1
